subject: Luge Racing
Olympic Games (2010)
lead_paragraph: The father of Nodar Kumaritashvili, the Georgian luger killed during training before the Vancouver Olympics, was presented with a top I.O.C. medal.
snippet: The father of Nodar Kumaritashvili, the Georgian luger killed during training before the Vancouver Olympics, was presented with a top I.O.C. medal.
